DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine immediate long-term effect prevention program child risk develop conduct problem antisocial behavior .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign year-long family-based intervention contact control group . The intervention focus improve parent practice , parent-child interaction , child social competence . Children assess begin study one year . The development conduct problem , social competence , school functioning assess second fifth grade . Assessments make observation , parent teacher rating , diagnostic interview .
